name: Isles of Bounty
description:
Isles of Bounty is a dungeon-crawler set amongst the floating Aerium Archipelago, where hordes of treasures await those bold enough to brave the harsh, rich and varied environments found high in the clouds! Explore the uniquely-themed islands, battling all manner of enemies - be they human or otherwise - in turn-based combat, using your newfound weapons and trinkets to the best of your ability as you fend off those who would claim those same treasures for themselves!

Step into the shoes of Rooker Drake, a sky pirate in the employ of seasoned and successful pirate captain Henry Aviary, as he traverses through five distinct environments on the hunt for the most valuable treasure in the skies – the Quixotic Cogs, said to hold a mystical power bestowed unto them from on high. Along the way, Rooker will meet colourful allies and fearsome foes – all brought together or against each other in the fight to own these celestial treasures.

From the vibrant and shining home of Fairy King Oberon to the freezing expanses of the tundra that the ferocious beast Fenrir calls home, experience a world where 2D sprite-work blends with 3D environments, creating a sense of depth in each new location as the world itself seeps onto your path.

Controls
WASD to Move
E To Open Inventory
Q to Drop Weapons
